articles.description: A photo of litter strewn in front of Glastonbury’s Pyramid Stage was taken in 2015 and not after Greta Thunberg’s 2022 speech at the festival, contrary to claims online.
articles.content:
A photo of litter strewn in front of Glastonburys Pyramid Stage was taken in 2015 and not after Greta Thunbergs 2022 speech at the festival, contrary to claims online.

articles.author: Andrew Pulver
articles.title: Top Gun: Maverick takes in over $1bn, the highest box office of 2022 so far - The Guardian
articles.description: After 31 days, the film has held on to its global audience to outstrip highest previous earner Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
articles.content:
Top Gun: Maverick has crossed the $1bn (£810m) mark in global box office receipts, making it the most successful film of 2022 so far, and the most successful of Tom Cruises career.
